Name: fromRoleNames
Description: User list will be loaded based on this list. All users will be loaded if you don't define.

Name: componentId
Description: Id of user autocomplete.

Name: selectedUser
Description: Required input and output value for selected user.

Name: excludedUsernames
Description: Users will be excluded from user selection. This is applied if you use default completeMethod.

Name: requiredMessage
Description: Message to be displayed when user autocomplete validation fails.

Name: forceSelection
Description: Only accepts user from the list when it's enabled.

Name: minQueryLength
Description: Number of characters to be typed before starting to query.

Name: completeMethod
Description: method for user autocomplete.

Name: isDisabled
Description: Disable User Selection.

Name: isRequired
Description: Marks User Selection as required.

Name: isReadOnly
Description: Cannot change user when it's enabled.

Name: isRenderedMessage
Description: Specify the rendering of message for user field.

Name: hightlight
Description: Highlights the first suggested user automatically.

Name: floatingLabel
Description: Display label with floating style and labelPanelStyleClass can't be applied if itâ€™s enabled.

Name: autocompleteStyleClass
Description: Style class of user autocomplete.

Name: autoCompletePanelStyleClass
Description: Style class of user autocomplete panel.

Name: inputStyleClass
Description: Style class of user autocomplete input.

Name: labelPanelStyleClass
Description: Style class of label panel.

Name: labelStyleClass
Description: Style class of label.

Name: label
Description: Text of label for User selection component.

Name: size
Description: Number of characters used to determine the width of the input element.

Name: messageStyleClass
Description: Style class of message.

Name: itemLabel
Description: Displayed text of selected user item and users in dropdown list.

Name: cache
Description: Autocomplete caches the searched result list if it's enabled.

Name: moreText
Description: The text shown in panel when the suggested list is greater than maxResults.

Name: queryDelay
Description: Delay to wait in milliseconds before sending each query to the server.

Name: maxResults
Description: Maximum number of results to be displayed.

Name: scrollHeight
Description: scrollHeight attribute of primefaces autocomplete.
